item.title: Deterministic Monorepo CI Platforms: Engineering Consistency at Scale
item.description: Monorepos promise unified visibility, atomic changes, and a single source of truth. They also create CI/CD nightmares if builds become flaky, nondeterministic, or painfully slow. Deterministic CI platforms tame that chaos by ensuring every pipeline run produces the same outputs given the same inputsâ€”no matter which engineer kicks it off, which runner executes it, or when it happens. This article is a long-form walkthrough for platform teams charged with shipping deterministic CI in sprawling monorepos covering mobile apps, microservices, infrastructure code, and ML assets. Expect hard-earned lessons, architectural blueprints, and operational playbooks drawn from companies that run tens of thousands of jobs per day without losing their sanity.
